m_szDocTitle: SolarCity Aiming For 1 Gigawatt Of New Rooftop Solar In 2015 | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: SolarCity Aiming For 1 Gigawatt Of New Rooftop Solar In 2015 Originally published on Solar Love . A recent report from SolarCity says it is on track to install more than 1 gigawatt of rooftop solar in 2015. The company reported installations of 153 megawatts during the first quarter 2015, beating its own forecast of 145 megawatts. That compares to 176 megawatts in the fourth quarter of 2014. Installations are up 87% from a year ago. The company has set a target of 1,000,000 customers by the middle of 2018.
